title: Countries with the largest gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Countrys.
The maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars 21439.45 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Switzerland where Country is 715.36.
Country United States has 29.97 times more GDP in billion U.S. dollars than Country Switzerland which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Countrys.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Switzerland.
Country China has the second highest value for GDP in billion U.S. dollars.
